The '''Realms MapMaker Cape''' is a [[cape]] given to certain contributors in the [[Java Realms Content Creator Program]].

== Appearance ==
The design is based on the logo for the [https://atlas.minecraft.net Atlas submission portal], the web interface used by invited creators to upload their maps for review.

== Distribution ==
This cape is given to contributors who meet the criteria listed [https://atlas.minecraft.net/guidelines#capes here].

== History ==
{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine||December 15, 2015|link=none|The cape is now given to contributors who meet the criteria.}}
}}
